s174: As general followed uprising at Qi, attacked south of Changshe, separately pacified Hanzhong and Shu, pacified Three Qins, attacked Xiang Yu, made marquis, 4,800 households
s175: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Jing Marquis Li Shang year 1
s179: 9th. Had crime. 7th. Zhong year 3, enfeoffed Shang's other son Jing Marquis Jian year 1
s180: 9th. Yuan Guang year 4, Kang Marquis Sui year 1. 5th. Yuan Shuo year 3, Marquis Zong year 1. 11th. Yuan Ding year 2, Marquis Zhong Gen year 1. 28th. Hou Yuan year 2, Marquis Zhong Gen convicted of cursing, executed, state abolished
s183: As attendant-in-chief followed uprising at Pei, reached Baxia, made marquis. Pacified Three Qins, had fief, became general. Entered Han, pacified Longxi, attacked Xiang Yu, guarded Yao Pass, pacified Si River and Donghai. 8,100 households
s184: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Wu Marquis Zhou Bo year 1
s186: 8th. His fourth year became Grand Commandant
s188: 13th. His third year became Grand Commandant; seventh year became Chancellor. Had crime, state abolished. 3rd. Hou year 1, enfeoffed Bo's son Gong Marquis Jian year 1
s189: 16th. Yuan Shuo year 5, Marquis Jian De year 1. 12th. Yuan Ding year 5, Marquis Jian De convicted of tribute gold, state abolished
s192: As retainer rose at Pei, followed to Baxia, made marquis. Entered Han, pacified Three Qins, became general, attacked Xiang Ji, twice increased enfeoffment. Followed in breaking Yan, captured Han Xin, marquis, 5,000 households
s193: 7th. Year 6 first month bing wu day, Wu Marquis Fan Kuai year 1. His seventh year became general, Chancellor for three months
